Nib
  • Nib  
  • Enums

Enums

Nib provides various enums for configuring view appearance and behavior.

Alignment

HorizontalAlignment

class nib.HorizontalAlignment(value, names=<not given>, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: str, Enum

Horizontal alignment options.

LEADING = 'leading'
CENTER = 'center'
TRAILING = 'trailing'
leading = 'leading'
center = 'center'
trailing = 'trailing'
nib.HorizontalAlignment.LEADING   # Left-aligned
nib.HorizontalAlignment.CENTER    # Center-aligned
nib.HorizontalAlignment.TRAILING  # Right-aligned

center = 'center'
bottom = 'bottom'

nib.VerticalAlignment.CENTER
nib.VerticalAlignment.BOTTOM

TRAILING = 'trailing'

nib.Alignment.TOPTRAILING
nib.Alignment.BOTTOMLEADING
nib.Alignment.BOTTOMTRAILING

Button Styles

ButtonStyle

class nib.ButtonStyle(value, names=<not given>, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: str, Enum

Button visual styles matching SwiftUI ButtonStyle.

Controls the visual appearance of buttons.

Styles:

  • AUTOMATIC: System default style

  • BORDERED: Button with a visible border

  • BORDERED_PROMINENT: Bordered with accent color fill

  • BORDERLESS: No visible border

  • PLAIN: Minimal styling

  • LINK: Appears as a clickable link

Example

>>> nib.Button("Primary", style=ButtonStyle.BORDERED_PROMINENT)
>>> nib.Button("Secondary", style=ButtonStyle.BORDERED)
>>> nib.Button("Link", style=ButtonStyle.LINK)
AUTOMATIC = 'automatic'
BORDERED = 'bordered'
BORDERED_PROMINENT = 'borderedProminent'
BORDERLESS = 'borderless'
PLAIN = 'plain'
LINK = 'link'
automatic = 'automatic'
bordered = 'bordered'
borderedProminent = 'borderedProminent'
borderless = 'borderless'
plain = 'plain'
link = 'link'
nib.ButtonStyle.AUTOMATIC        # System default
nib.ButtonStyle.BORDERED         # Bordered button
nib.ButtonStyle.BORDEREDPROMINENT  # Prominent bordered (filled)
nib.ButtonStyle.BORDERLESS       # No border
nib.ButtonStyle.PLAIN            # Plain text

ButtonRole

class nib.ButtonRole(value, names=<not given>, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: str, Enum

Button semantic roles matching SwiftUI ButtonRole.

DESTRUCTIVE = 'destructive'
CANCEL = 'cancel'
destructive = 'destructive'
cancel = 'cancel'
nib.ButtonRole.NONE          # Default role
nib.ButtonRole.CANCEL        # Cancel action
nib.ButtonRole.DESTRUCTIVE   # Destructive action (red)

Image Styles

ContentMode

class nib.ContentMode(value, names=<not given>, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: str, Enum

Image content mode options for aspect ratio handling.

FIT = 'fit'
FILL = 'fill'
nib.ContentMode.FIT    # Fit within bounds
nib.ContentMode.FILL   # Fill bounds (may crop)

Scroll

ScrollAxis

class nib.ScrollAxis(value, names=<not given>, *values, module=None, qualname=None, type=None, start=1, boundary=None)[source]

Bases: str, Enum

ScrollView axis options.

HORIZONTAL = 'horizontal'
VERTICAL = 'vertical'
BOTH = 'both'
horizontal = 'horizontal'
vertical = 'vertical'
both = 'both'
nib.ScrollAxis.VERTICAL
